thread.title: 2face: Bez rises to singer's defense amidst backlash over cancelled protest
thread.title_full: 2face: Bez rises to singer's defense amidst backlash over cancelled protest

author: Inemesit Udodiong
title: 2face: Bez rises to singer's defense amidst backlash over cancelled protest
text:
(C.A.M.P ) In a series of tweet, the singer showed his support, while urging people to stop attacking the legendary music star. He started by saying, "Nigeria's biggest problem is Nigerians, and only a small population is in leadership..." 
You can't form solidarity with them, they will always think you want to cheat them or you want to be greater than them.. — BEZ (@BEZidakula) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
Go to any ministry in Abuja and study it...you will find out the minister isn't the boss..THE PEOPLE are the ones running things there... — BEZ (@BEZidakula) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
Have you asked yourself why Fashola hasn't done Lagos Magic?? No be him get ministry!! Guys that have been on ground are holding it down — BEZ (@BEZidakula) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
If you see the insult 2baba chopped, kai... and he didn't kill anyone ohh... If we behave the way we do, we deserve what we have. — BEZ (@BEZidakula) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 Bez rested his case with this, " That's why I like to mind my business. God, family, friends, work, purpose. The rest na bonus." 
Bez performing at 'Asa Live in Concert' (Press)
